mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.ecba001 AS ITEM_CODE, a.ecba002 AS ROUTE_CODE FROM DSDATA.ecba_t A LEFT JOIN DSDATA.ECBB_T B on a.ecba001 = b.ecbb001 and a.ecba002 = b.ecbb002 and a.ecbaent = b.ecbbent and a.ecbasite = b.ecbbsite where a.ecbasite = 'AM01' and a.ecbaent = 100 and a.ecba001 is not null and a.ecba002 is not null order by a.ecba001 , ECBA002

SELECT DISTINCT a.ecba001 AS ITEM_CODE, a.ecba002 AS ROUTE_CODE, a.ecba003 AS ROUTE_DESC , b.ecbb004 AS PROCESS_CODE, b.ecbb008 AS TOP_PROCESS_CODE , b.ecbb010 AS NEXT_PROCESS_CODE , b.ecbb003 AS SEQUENCE FROM DSDATA.ecba_t A LEFT JOIN DSDATA.ECBB_T B on a.ecba001 = b.ecbb001 and a.ecba002 = b.ecbb002 and a.ecbaent = b.ecbbent and a.ecbasite = b.ecbbsite where a.ecbasite = 'AM01' and a.ecbaent = 100 and a.ecba001 is not null and a.ecba002 is not null and b.ecbb004 is not null order by a.ecba001 , ECBA002

SELECT DISTINCT a.sfoadocno AS WORKORDER_NO, sfob003 AS PROCESS_CODE, b.sfob007 AS TOP_PROCESS_CODE, b.sfob009 AS NEXT_PROCESS_CODE, c.sfaa010 AS ITEM_CODE FROM DSDATA.SFOA_T A LEFT JOIN DSDATA.SFOB_T B ON a.sfoadocno = b.sfobdocno AND a.sfoaent = b.sfobent AND a.sfoasite = b.sfobsite LEFT JOIN DSDATA.SFAA_T C ON a.sfoadocno = c.sfaadocno AND a.sfoaent = c.sfaaent AND a.sfoasite = c.sfaasite WHERE a.sfoaent = 100 --AND sfoacnfdt BETWEEN SYSDATE - INTERVAL '5' MINUTE AND SYSDATE AND a.sfoasite = 'AM01' AND a.sfoadocno = #{workOrderNo}
